segments.text: I heard you were on a date last night ! So , how did it go ? I want all the juicy details !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um ... well , actually , we had a fantastic time last night . He was ... amazing !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , now you really have to fill me in . What ’ s he like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He ’ s really good looking , he ’ s quite tall , around 6 ’ 1 ” , he ’ s in his early thirties , and he ’ s got the most beautiful dark brown eyes ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He sounds hot ! What does he do for a living ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what , this is the best part . David is a junior investment banker at Fortune Bank , so he ’ s got a great career path ahead of him !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on a sec , his name is David ?
segments.speaker: S1
